channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-20488|2024-08-03T17:45:44.387Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.2 could allow an authenticated malicious user to change the passwords of other users in the Windows AD environment when IBM Security Identity Manager Windows Password Synch Plug-in is deployed and configured. IBM X-Force ID: 197789.

item.title: CVE-2021-20483|2024-08-03T17:45:44.106Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.2 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). By sending a specially crafted request, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive data. IBM X-Force ID: 197591.
